body.para: The Jog function switches are used to select the axis and direction of axes movement for the Reference Position Return/Jog/Rapid/Handle mode. The feed rate is selected with the “Rapid Traverse Override” switch in the Reference Position Return mode and with the “Jog Feed” switch in the Jog mode (Refer to 2.7.2 Feed Rate/Override Switches & 11 Manual Operation).

table.style: width:100%; cell-padding:3px; border-width:0px; border-spacing:0px; border-collapse:collapse; cell-border-width:1px; border-color:#000000; border-style:solid; head-row-background-color:#dddddd; alt-row-background-color:none;

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: This switch selects the X-axis for the Jog function. By selecting the X-axis, the table will move horizontally, left or right during the Jog function.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: This switch selects the Y-axis for the Jog function. By selecting the Y-axis, the table will move backward or forward during the Jog function.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: This switch selects the Z-axis for the Jog function. By selecting the Z-axis, the spindle head will move vertically, up or down during the Jog function.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: This switch selects the optional 4th-axis for the Jog function which can be a rotational axis.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: This switch selects the optional 5th-axis for the Jog function which can be a rotational axis.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: This switch selects the optional CS-axis for the Jog function which can be a rotational axis.
B. Direction of Axes Movement Switches

table.style: width:100%; cell-padding:3px; border-width:0px; border-spacing:0px; border-collapse:collapse; cell-border-width:1px; border-color:#000000; border-style:solid; head-row-background-color:#dddddd; alt-row-background-color:none;

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: This switch moves the selected axis in the ‘+’ direction. Press and hold to constantly move the axis with the selected feed rate.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: This switch moves the selected axis in the ‘-’ direction. Press and hold to constantly move the axis with the selected feed rate.
